web_snippets: Hazel Phillips. Hazel Phillips is the author of four books: Fire & Ice ... biography of Sir Bob Harvey; and Sell! (2013), a history of the advertising ...
Hazel Phillips was born in England, UK. She is known for Love and Monsters (2020), The Portable Door (2023) and The Set (1970).
Hazel Phillips, a previously unpublished author in the area of narrative nonfiction, is a former journalist turned communications professional.
